title: Ocean Week

embed.description: When we first cooked up the idea for Ocean Week back in 2015, League of Legends was in a very different place. We were all living in the old client, a place where mana potions were still a thing, Galio had rockin' abs and Nunu was... well, he was still Nunu.

body:
> Ocean Week is being retired, gently sailing into the sunset to join the likes of that flying statue’s rock solid abs.

I'm done! I'm f\*cking done...

Pretty much the *one* good thing we had left, which was not only bringing the community together but also benefiting the local wildlife (and tourism), and Riot's just ripped it away without a care...
